sentence: Georgia voters know that unlike political opportunist and woke leftist Stacey Abrams, Brian Kemp shares their values and works for them.? The RGA air cover for Kemp came within days of Vernon Jones dropping out of the Georgia GOP gubernatorial primary, giving Perdue an unobstructed opportunity to oust Kemp.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Republican governors buy ads in Georgia to help Brian Kemp

sentence: Now Perdue is running in the Republican primary for Georgia governor against incumbent Republican Brian Kemp, and he is hoping this time support from Trump will be enough to galvanize supporters.
